text: Either I like the track and nobody can hear it or it's just rubbish! 😁 I give up - I've put Peter Green's track back on.
I don t like the new soundtrack as much as the soundtrack from 2021-02-04
Unfortunately your new track is not available in the States :(
I've changed the music to be more relaxing. The last track gave me a headache! 😁
Fixed! (need a hard refresh by holding F5 or CTRL+R for a couple of seconds)
@balkhan - Yes, thanks for clarifying it's not just me. Bizarrely, it still works on the iPad App  - well it compiles and runs anyway.

idk, I get these errors : 
[code]
'#' : invalid character
'define' : syntax error
[/code]
I needed to scroll down and up for them to show though.
so what, defines are no longer allowed in sound?

It had to do with the defines, I did a quick fix here (unlisted) : https://www.shadertoy.com/view/3dtBRf
just replaced the defines by constants in sound and common tabs

Ouch! Anybody know why the Sound tab no longer works? The error is fairly ambiguous!
Thanks.
Just had to login to say how awesome this is! pure inspiration and a pleasure to have come across! <3

Hi, thanks. The dot product is a way of getting a single value from two complicated vectors. I don't know who did it first for distance fields, sorry, I probably got the idea from 'Shane's great work.
Wow, had you seen/done the dot(sin(p), cos(p)) terrain method before this shader? Your code is very readable.
interesting. first time i see .switch used in a shader.
Thanks man! The misty clouds are not volumetric though, see 't' in  the function getSky in 'B'. They are using only one position.
Very nice! I like the volumetric clouds, it really add to the sense of speed.
magical <3
Glorious!
Holy crap. This is seriously insane, I don't even know what to say.
Fantastic!
I meant '123' seconds in - doh.

Thanks for the kind words folks!
At 1.23 (without mouse interference), there's a nice curling rock that would make a cool wave effect I might try at some point.
dude wtf... this is crazy
wow, how?!?! absolutely amazing! :)
Beautiful and fast! Awesome, well done! :)
Wow,it feels like intro of hollywood movies ...
Holy #$%! am i flying?!
Wow amazing scene!
I've fixed the lens-flare occlusion and used the 'Common' buffer a little - a nice addition to Shadertoy, thanks! :)
:love:

Just added a lens-flare effect. But I don't know if I've got the Z obscuring correct in 'Image' - line 264 to 265. Can anyone help? It does seem to work but sometimes I think it's wrong, so I wondered if I have an aspect ratio problem or something.
Added wind and a caw using a formant graph of a crow sound. :)
Very nice! This is a high-res and better-looking version of Fugl! Add controls for the bird, pack it into an exe and sell it on steam for 10$! :)
wow!
The birds wing movements look natural and nice!

The crow just follows the camera path that carves a big tunnel in the rock. The crow then has a  SinCos fly around that tunnel. See the switch statement in Buf A. I didn't really notice any extra buffer slowdown, and I have a fairly old GFX card.
Have you measured the performance change due to the extra buffers?

Great shading. I keep seeing facial images embedded in the rocks. Am I freaking out?
How does Mr. Crow miss all the floating rocks? And what about some crow sound effects?
Added a leaky integrator IIR for smoothing of flap power, as it seemed a little On/Off at times. Also some tail twitching.
Cool!
wow !!
It doesn't lag enough, please add trees!
Music changed to royalty free. It's a bit cheesy, but I think it works quite well.
Wow fantastic!
:) The flap amount is based on incline.
Nice! Smooth framerate @ 1080p with only a few occasional stutters. And the bird always seems to flap its wings at just the right time :)
Thanks guys! I wanted to convey it battling against the wind. I've just brightened things up a bit, and hopefully improved the movement.
This is extraordinary and amazingly fast for so much complexity !
awesome work! such great detail on the motion of the bird!
The bird flight and feathers are incredibly naturals!
wow,run so fast!
Brilliant. Nice and relaxing

wow Fantastic shader!!!
Specially Love montains and ice surface effect!
That's nice to watch. I like the atmosphere.
Super good!!! Really impressive
Cool! Seems to render very fast and the jittery feathers really add to the sense of speed.
:love: The landscape is so well done.
The rocky landscape somehow remind me of Alien :) But the nice friendly background music and warm light/sky brings one back to the cheerful side of things.
Massive!
